Morgan St, MC 152, Chicago, IL, 60607    Office Phone:  (312) 996-2664    Email:  wuxb@uic.edu    Related Sites:    View full profile  CV  Google Scholar          About   Research Interests:  My research focuses on computer systems.performance and efficiency of memory and storage systems. I'm looking for motivated MS/PhD students interested in computer systems research. If you're interested please send me your CV and transcripts.
